about_the_game:
In the year 1985, an alien landed on earth with a mission to steal all the gravity. With the world going in chaos and things are floating in air, the two heroes of the game go on a quest to chase down the alien and restore gravity back to earth. Their weapon is a magical balance board that they stand and balance themselves on to restore order back to earth.

Balance Party is a unique game that can only be played by balancing your body on a balance board controller created specifically for the game. By tilting your body left and right and learning to master your body’s balance, you get better in the game. The game can be played by up to 2 players for the ultimate balance fun. The game can also be played with Controllers and Keyboard.

Main Features:
  • Become the Game: Immerse yourself by controlling the game with your body! The exclusive Balance Board controller, designed specifically for this adventure, not only enhances your balance but also aids in restoring gravity to planet Earth! (Also supports traditional controllers and keyboard controls).
  • Jump Right In: With intuitive gameplay, it's easy to dive in and start having fun immediately—perfect for gamers of all skill levels!
  • Ultimate Balance Quest: Tackle over 50 meticulously crafted mini-games, each one designed to test and improve your balance in the most thrilling ways imaginable!
  • Track Your Mastery: Personalize your profile to monitor your progress as you conquer challenges and refine your skills.
  • Team Up for Victory: Partner with another player in cooperative mode, work together to overcome obstacles and achieve success!
  • Master the Extreme: Ready for the ultimate test? Push your limits by taking on the Hard Difficulty Mode, where only the most skilled will prevail!
